feed.title: Authentik Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Authentik: Release 2024.4.3
entry.content:
See https://docs.goauthentik.io/docs/releases/2024.4#fixed-in-202443

What's Changed

  • core: fix source flow_manager not always appending save stage (cherry-pick #9659) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/9662
  • web: fix value handling inside controlled components (cherry-pick #9648) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/9685
  • sources/saml: fix FlowPlanner error due to pickle (cherry-pick #9708) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/9709
  • security: fix CVE-2024-38371 (cherry-pick #10229) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/10233
  • security: fix CVE-2024-37905 (cherry-pick #10230) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/10236

Full Changelog: https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/compare/version/2024.4.2...version/2024.4.3

entry.title: New release for Authentik: Release 2024.6.0
entry.content:
See https://docs.goauthentik.io/docs/releases/2024.6

What's Changed

  • website/docs: Remove hyphen in read replica in Release Notes (cherry-pick #10178) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/10188
  • core: rework base for SkipObject exception to better support control flow exceptions (cherry-pick #10186) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/10187
  • web/flows: update flow background (cherry-pick #10206) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/10207
  • security: fix CVE-2024-38371 (cherry-pick #10229) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/10234
  • security: fix CVE-2024-37905 (cherry-pick #10230) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/10237

Full Changelog: https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/compare/version/2024.6.0-rc2...version/2024.6.0

entry.title: New release for Authentik: Release 2024.6.1
entry.content:
See https://docs.goauthentik.io/docs/releases/2024.6#fixed-in-202461

What's Changed

  • website/docs: update 2024.6 release notes with latest changes (cherry-pick #10228) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/10243
  • website/docs: remove RC disclaimer from 2024.6 release notes (cherry-pick #10245) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/10246
  • security: update supported versions (cherry-pick #10247) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/10248
  • website/docs: update geoip and asn example to use the proper syntax (cherry-pick #10249) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/10250
  • website/docs: update geoip and asn documentation following field changes (cherry-pick #10265) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/10266
  • stages/user_login: fix ?next parameter not carried through broken session binding (cherry-pick #10301) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/10302
  • web/flows: remove background image link (cherry-pick #10318) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/10320
  • core: remove transitionary old JS urls (cherry-pick #10317) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/10321
  • provider/scim: Fix exception handling for missing ServiceProviderConfig (cherry-pick #10322) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/10335
  • providers/saml: fix metadata import error handling (cherry-pick #10349) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/10350
  • sources/saml: fix pickle error, add saml auth tests (cherry-pick #10348) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/10352
  • sources/oauth: fix link not being saved (cherry-pick #10374) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/10376
  • stages/authenticator_validate: fix friendly_name being required (cherry-pick #10382) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/10385
  • core: fix migrations missing using db_alias (cherry-pick #10409) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/10410
  • web/admin: fix access token list calling wrong API (cherry-pick #10434) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/10435
  • core: fix source flow_manager not resuming flow when linking (cherry-pick #10436) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/10438
  • core: revert backchannel only filtering (cherry-pick #10455) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/10457
  • website/docs: add 2024.6.1 release notes (cherry-pick #10456) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/10458

Full Changelog: https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/compare/version/2024.6.0...version/2024.6.1

entry.title: New release for Authentik: Release 2024.6.2
entry.content:
See https://docs.goauthentik.io/docs/releases/2024.6#fixed-in-202462

What's Changed

  • core: improve error handling on ASGI level (cherry-pick #10547) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/10552
  • lib/sync: handle SkipObject in direct triggered tasks (cherry-pick #10590) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/10591
  • stages/prompt: fix prompt not editable with invalid expression (cherry-pick #10603) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/10604
  • events: fix race condition (cherry-pick #10602) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/10609
  • core: remove html language tag for pages that are translated (cherry-pick #10611) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/10613
  • web/admin: fix missing SAML Provider ECDSA options (cherry-pick #10612) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/10618
  • lifecycle: only create tenant media root if needed (cherry-pick #10616) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/10617
  • web/flows: remove continue button from AutoSubmit stage (cherry-pick #10253) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/10677
  • events: associate login_failed events to a user if possible (cherry-pick #10270) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/10676
  • web/admin: show matching user reputation scores in user details (cherry-pick #10276) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/10699
  • outposts: make refresh interval configurable (cherry-pick #10138) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/10700
  • outposts: ensure minimum refresh interval (cherry-pick #10701) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/10702
  • tests/e2e: fix ldap tests following #10270 (cherry-pick #10288) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/10703

Full Changelog: https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/compare/version/2024.6.1...version/2024.6.2

entry.title: New release for Authentik: Release 2024.6.3
entry.content:
See https://docs.goauthentik.io/docs/releases/2024.6#fixed-in-202463

What's Changed

  • web: fix theme not applying to document correctly (cherry-pick #10721) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/10722
  • sources/scim: fix duplicate service account users and changing token (cherry-pick #10735) by @rissson in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/10737
  • web: replace all occurences of the theme placeholder (cherry-pick #10749) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/10750
  • enterprise/rac: fix error when listing connection tokens as non-superuser (cherry-pick #10771) by @gcp-cherry-pick-bot in https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/pull/10773

Full Changelog: https://github.com/goauthentik/authentik/compare/version/2024.6.2...version/2024.6.3
